en.title: Tap & Build - Cinematic Trailer
en.subtitle: Idle Factory Tycoon
en.taglineDesc: The ultimate idle factory tycoon. Start with a single tap, build an empire that spans dimensions.
en.dailyRewardsDesc: 30 days of escalating rewards â€¢ Never miss a day!
en.respect1Desc: Ads are 100% optional. Watch for bonuses, never required.
en.respect2Desc: All 21 generators, all features accessible completely FREE.
en.respect3Desc: Leaderboards are fair. Skill & dedication, not wallet size.
en.respect4Desc: Play as much as you want, whenever you want.
en.respect5Desc: $4.99 removes ads forever + bonuses. No subscriptions.
en.offlineDesc:
Your factories never stop producing.
Come back to massive rewards!
